::Cledar/Rixer/Blyer/Forrior/Firearm/Prowl::

Cledar and Forrior look at each other after Necromancer goes off, and run down
another hallway, guns ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rixer jumps up, yelling "Eurika!"

He turns around, showing the finished scanner to Blyer. "Got it. Now lets see if this
thing will work."

The two bots sit down, Rixer activating the scanner and searching for IR with it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm runs past Rixer and Blyer, running into a hallway and heading down it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl walks stealthily down the hallway that he was in, hearing Necromancer and Hell
Drak below him but not being able to make out their voices. Not making any sound, he
sneaks toward where his mind tells him IR is.
